item.title: Movie Review: Abigail (2024)
item.description: Abigail (2024) - Link to heading Follow me on Letterboxd! Spoiler-Free Section Link to heading I had mediocre expectations going into this movie as I think practically every horror movie is overdone and ends up being a bust, but Abigail was a pleasant surprise. This movie is decently well paced, well acted, and has fine shots. The special effects weren’t great by any stretch of the imagination, but that seems to be a common theme in newer movies with tighter deadlines requiring effects artists to rush.
